name: Goblin Tide
description:
All the goblins in the world have come together and are plotting to take over. The best wizards in the world have been chosen to fight this army. Choose which of these wizards you want to take into battle to stop the Goblin Tide.

FEATURE LIST:

  • 9 levels
  • 4 unique spells for each wizard
  • 4 goblin variants
  • 3 unique level sets

CONTROLS:

  • W,A,S,D to move
  • Move the mouse to look around
  • Numbers 1-4 to use spells once they're unlocked
  • Left click to attack
